forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with periods of rain this afternoon. Some mixed winter precipitation possible. High 2C. Winds E at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with periods of rain this afternoon. Temps nearly steady in the mid 30s. Winds E at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Higher wind gusts possible.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
